divs: Sighting DetailsSHINY METALLIC CIGAR SHAPE CROSSED SKY QUICKLY BRIGHT REFLECTED LIGHT EAST TO WEST MOVEMENT. I SAW IT BRIEFLY CHANGE DIRECTION FOR ONE MOMENT AND IT RESEMBLED A COMET. SHONE WHITE AT LONG DISTANCE. 1-2 MINUTE SIGHTING THEN OBJECT OUT OF RANGE OF SIGHT.
Summary: SAW CIGAR SHAPED OBJECT HURTLE ACROSS SKY AT HIGH RATE OF SPEED GIRLFRIEND CALLED ME OUTSIDE BY TIME I SAW IT IT RESEMBLED A COMET
trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
